languages.text: {n}Простолюдины и дворяне с обожанием взирают на вас и — с ужасом и любопытством — на Ирлиэт. Вид смирно стоящего подле вас {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} заставляет их благоговеть перед вами.{/n}

{n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Простолюдины и дворяне с обожанием взирают на вас и — с ужасом и любопытством — на Ирлиэт. Вид смирно стоящего подле вас {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} заставляет их благоговеть перед вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

{n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

{n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

{n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一般市民と貴族は崇敬の念をもってあなたを見上げるが、ユリエットに対しては恐れと好奇を込めている。あなたのそばに{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が直立不動で立っているという光景は、畏怖の念を群衆に呼び起こしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一般市民と貴族は崇敬の念をもってあなたを見上げるが、ユリエットに対しては恐れと好奇を込めている。あなたのそばに{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が直立不動で立っているという光景は、畏怖の念を群衆に呼び起こしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}无论是平民还是贵族，都以崇拜的目光仰望着你，但他们望向伊莉耶特的目光却交织着恐惧与好奇。当他们看到一位{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}肃立在你身边时，他们的心中不由充满了敬畏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无论是平民还是贵族，都以崇拜的目光仰望着你，但他们望向伊莉耶特的目光却交织着恐惧与好奇。当他们看到一位{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}肃立在你身边时，他们的心中不由充满了敬畏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los plebeyos y los nobles te miran con adoración y a Yrliet con horror y curiosidad. Ver a una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} firme a tu lado les inspira una gran admiración.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los plebeyos y los nobles te miran con adoración y a Yrliet con horror y curiosidad. Ver a una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} firme a tu lado les inspira una gran admiración.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Roturiers comme aristocrates vous regardent avec admiration, mais ne peuvent réprimer des coups d'œil aussi horrifiés que curieux en direction d'Yrliet. La simple vue d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} à vos côtés ne fait que renforcer leur vénération à votre égard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Roturiers comme aristocrates vous regardent avec admiration, mais ne peuvent réprimer des coups d'œil aussi horrifiés que curieux en direction d'Yrliet. La simple vue d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} à vos côtés ne fait que renforcer leur vénération à votre égard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bürger und der Adel sehen dich bewundernd an, bei Yrliet ist es eher Abscheu und Neugier. Der Anblick der strammstehenden {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} an deiner Seite erweckt in ihnen Ehrfurcht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bürger und der Adel sehen dich bewundernd an, bei Yrliet ist es eher Abscheu und Neugier. Der Anblick der strammstehenden {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} an deiner Seite erweckt in ihnen Ehrfurcht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hem avam halk hem de soylular sana hayranlıkla, Yrliet'e ise dehşet ve merakla bakıyor. Yanındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenonun{/g} görüntüsü, kalplerine dehşet saçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The commoners and nobility look upon you with adoration, and upon Yrliet with horror and curiosity. The sight of the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} standing at attention by your side strikes awe into their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hem avam halk hem de soylular sana hayranlıkla, Yrliet'e ise dehşet ve merakla bakıyor. Yanındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}nun görüntüsü kalplerine dehşet saçıyor.{/n}
